img_above_text:
There's a large pit in the middle of this courtyard, but before you follow Zhu Bajie down, check the large altar on the other side of the pit, and you'll be able to claim a **Celestial Jade Lotus Pill** to increase your maximum health!
The Webbed Hollow Celestial Jade Lotus Pill
img_below_text:
When you're ready to move to the next area, jump into the pit, only to find yourself taking a one way trip down to the true **Webbed Hollow** of this realm.
Village of Lanxi Complete

img_summary: The image depicts a scene from the game walkthrough for "Village of Lanxi," showing a large pit in a courtyard with a red arrow indicating the direction to jump into the pit. This image serves as a visual guide for players, instructing them to jump into the pit to progress to the next area, known as the Webbed Hollow, after collecting a Celestial Jade Lotus Pill from a nearby altar to increase their maximum health.
